customrecordcustomfield.help: Only applicable to new eInvoice2Cash 2.0 to support subsidiary.
customrecordcustomfield.label: [scriptid=custcollection_fsm.custrecord_nx_subsidiary_name]

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select currency to be used instead of subsidiary
customrecordcustomfield.label: [scriptid=custcollection_zc_ap_beneficiary_account.currency_lbl]

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this feature to reconcile transactions processed via eInvoice and eCustomer deposit in Netsuite. US1 & Global gateways only.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Reconciliation (US1 & GLOBAL ONLY)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Payment Instrument - select a payment card token payment method
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment Card Token Payment Method

customrecordcustomfield.help: Payment Instrument - select a general token payment method
customrecordcustomfield.label: General Token Payment Method

customrecordcustomfield.help: select a non-taxable tax code for surcharge line item
customrecordcustomfield.label: Surcharge Non-Taxable Tax Code

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select gateway to process ACH. Leave blank to use default E-Invoice Gateway. (Global only)
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-Invoice ACH Gateway

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter URL to redirect user after completing payment on eInvoice hosted payment page.
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-Invoice Confirmation URL Redirect (HTTPS)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Amount less than threshold will be forced to ACH payment. Global gateway only.
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-Invoice ACH Threshold

customrecordcustomfield.description: Apply Additional Charge to Remaining Amount
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to only apply the additional charge to the remaining total. Default is to apply to full amount.
customrecordcustomfield.label: e-Invoice Apply Additional Charge to Remaining Amount

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable Token List to store token returning token from external payment.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Enable Token List

customrecordcustomfield.help: Flexible Payment Amount - Allows user to specify a payment amount up to the total deposit amount. Note: Additional charge feature cannot be used with flexible amount feature.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Flexible Payment Amount

customrecordcustomfield.description: E-Invoice Additional Charge - For CC Only
customrecordcustomfield.help: Allow additional charge option only for credit card
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-Invoice Additional Charge - Apply To CC Only

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to apply surcharge rule set. Surcharge will not be applied to debit card and certain States.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Apply Surcharge Rules

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this feature to display an option for user to set payment token as default.
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-Invoice Default Token Option

customrecordcustomfield.help: Flexible Deposit Amount - Allows user to specify deposit amount up to the total deposit amount. Note: Additional charge feature cannot be used with flexible amount feature.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Flexible Deposit Amount

customrecordcustomfield.description: Auto apply Customer Deposit to Invoice
customrecordcustomfield.help: Auto apply Customer Deposit to Invoice
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-Customer Deposit Auto Apply Payment (Beta Test Only)

customrecordcustomfield.description: E-Customer Deposit Non-Inventory Item Internal Id
customrecordcustomfield.help: E-Customer Deposit Non-Inventory Item Internal Id
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-Customer Deposit Non-Inventory Item Internal Id

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter a description to enable the option to allow user to set token as default for the customer account.
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-Customer Deposit Default Token Option

customrecordcustomfield.description: E-CustomerDeposit Additional Charge - Apply To CC Only
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to not apply additional charge (surcharge)
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-CustomerDeposit Additional Charge - Apply To CC Only

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter URL to redirect user after completing payment on eCustomer Deposit hosted payment page.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter URL to redirect user after completing payment on eCustomer Deposit hosted payment page.
customrecordcustomfield.label: E-Customer Deposit Confirmation URL Redirect (HTTPS)

customrecordcustomfield.help: CC Token Sandbox Environment - Test Mode
customrecordcustomfield.label: CC Token Sandbox

customrecordcustomfield.help: API-Tokenization Key (Global) - requires for collect js method.
customrecordcustomfield.label: API-Tokenization Key (Global)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter a description to enable the option to allow user to set token as default for the customer account.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment Token Default Token Option

customrecordcustomfield.help: JWT secret is required to submit token requests to Solupay.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Secret

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter up to 10 customer internal ids (comma delimiter) to ebatch.
customrecordcustomfield.label: eBatch Customer Filter

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the number in which NMI merchant custom field is set to store estatement invoices. For example: merchant_defined_field_6 -> enter 6
customrecordcustomfield.label: eStatement NMI Merchant Custom Field
